column4: could anyone that knows about harddrive problems take a look at http://pastebin.ca/547649 and tell me what this possibly means. Fucked up disks or some other problem?
what type of hardrive and model? what output this error? what file system and partitions? did you screw up hdparm?
messed up disks i ment to say :)
its output by dmesg. i also get the error "read only filesystem" when i try to create something on it now. its a maxtor drive. filesystem is ext3, and i havent changed anything with hdparm anyways
